analysis.key_quote: If politicians become involved in this process, I think it ruins it. My grants should not require a political angle to be taken seriously- they should be judged based on the merits of the science that I have proposed.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of maintaining a merit-based system in scientific evaluation and expressing concerns about the politicization of federal agencies, which would undermine the integrity of scientific processes.
